effects: Reduce damage taken by 30% to all allies for 3 turns

desc_short: Reduce damage taken for all allies for three turns

3턴 동안 아군 전체가 받는 피해량 감소
Réduit les dégâts reçus par tous les alliés pendant trois tours

Reduce el daño recibido por aliados durante tres turnos
